channel.title: Gauntlet Comics: Allied Angels Winter of '42 (Masks)
channel.description:
*Gauntlet Comics: Allied Angels: Winter of '42 (Masks)*
With the heroes of Gauntlet City fighting overseas, it's up to the plucky gals of the Allied Angles to protect the Home Front!
Comics Code-approved retro-pulp adventure in the Gauntlet Comics Universe! Play a character from a previous Gauntlet City Home front game, or create a new Allied Angel to join the fight.
Issue #1 of 4: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LdCPIxe8iVnwazdu25p [date=2019-06-03 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] Issue #2 of 4: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LdCPU9zmubKYFgdPiiH [date=2019-06-10 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] Issue #3 of 4: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LdCPfOxVcycBTqV7gUZ [date=2019-06-17 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] Issue #4 of 4: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LdCPrzku4JJ30ECiUB- [date=2019-06-24 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]
